title: Shane Gillis’s 2025 Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: Gillis will embark on his biggest standup tour yet in 2025. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here. Shane Gillis’s 2025 Tour: How to Get Tickets Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito
excerpt: Shane Gillis has announced a brand new standup tour for 2025. See the full list of his upcoming dates and learn how to get pre-sale tickets.
text: Comedian Shane Gillis will be hitting the road for a sprawling 2025 standup tour. Dubbed his “biggest tour yet,” the 27-date trek will take Gillis to venues in the US, Canada, the UK, and Ireland next spring and summer. Scroll below to read more details, including how to get tickets and the full list of Gillis’ upcoming dates. Get Shane Gillis Tickets Here How Can I Buy Tickets to See Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour? Tickets for Shane Gillis’ 2025 tour are currently available via an artist ticket presale (use code SGLIVE). General on-sale will open on Friday, November 15th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, you can also find them at StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Is Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour? Announced on Tuesday, November 12th, Shane Gillis’ 2025 tour will be a sprawling, multinational trek, kicking off on January 10th with a show in San Antonio, Texas. From there, he’ll perform in US and Canadian cities like Pittsburgh, Vancouver, Seattle, Salt Lake City, and more. Then, in March, Gillis will hop the pond for a show in Dublin on March 21st, and another in London on the 23rd. After that, he’ll return stateside for shows in Indianapolis, Washington DC, San Diego, and more. He’ll wrap with a final set in San Jose, California on June 28th. Check out the full list of upcoming dates below. Gillis has become one of standup’s most popular live acts in recent years. In 2023, he released his most recent standup special, Beautiful Dogs, via Netflix. He’s also appeared on the Peacock series Bupkis, and co-created and stars in the Netflix series Tires. What Are Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour Dates? See the full list of Shane Gillis’ upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here. Shane Gillis 2025 Tour Dates: 01/10 – San Antonio, TX @ Frost Bank Center 01/11 – Dallas, TX @ American Airlines Center 01/17 – Pittsburgh, PA @ PPG Paints Arena 01/18 – Cincinnati, OH @ Heritage Bank Center 01/31 – Vancouver, BC @ Rogers Arena 02/01 – Seattle, WA @ Climate Pledge Arena 02/22 – Minneapolis, MN @ Target Center 03/07 – Tampa, FL @ Amalie Arena 03/08 – Jacksonville, FL @ VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena 03/14 – Colorado Springs, CO @ The Broadmoor World Arena 03/15 – Salt Lake City, UT @ Delta Center 03/21 – Dublin, Ireland @ 3Arena 03/23 – London, UK @ The O2 04/04 – Columbus, OH @ Nationwide Arena 04/05 – Indianapolis, IN @ Gainbridge Fieldhouse 04/11 – Cleveland, OH @ Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse 04/12 – Washington, DC @ Capital One Arena 04/25 – Knoxville, TN @ Thompson-Boling Arena at Food City Center 04/26 – Birmingham, AL @ Legacy Arena at the BJCC 05/02 – Albany, NY @ MVP Arena 05/03 – Buffalo, NY @ KeyBank Center 05/09 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Center 05/10 – Norfolk, VA @ Scope Arena 05/30 – Omaha, NE @ CHI Health Center Omaha 05/31 – Des Moines, IA @ Wells Fargo Arena 06/07 – San Diego, CA @ Pechanga Arena San Diego 06/28 – San Jose, CA @ SAP Center at San Jose
html:
Comedian Shane Gillis will be hitting the road for a sprawling 2025 standup tour.

Dubbed his “biggest tour yet,” the 27-date trek will take Gillis to venues in the US, Canada, the UK, and Ireland next spring and summer. Scroll below to read more details, including how to get tickets and the full list of Gillis’ upcoming dates.

Get Shane Gillis Tickets Here

How Can I Buy Tickets to See Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour?

Tickets for Shane Gillis’ 2025 tour are currently available via an artist ticket presale (use code SGLIVE). General on-sale will open on Friday, November 15th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Once tickets are on sale, you can also find them at StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Is Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour?

Announced on Tuesday, November 12th, Shane Gillis’ 2025 tour will be a sprawling, multinational trek, kicking off on January 10th with a show in San Antonio, Texas. From there, he’ll perform in US and Canadian cities like Pittsburgh, Vancouver, Seattle, Salt Lake City, and more.

Then, in March, Gillis will hop the pond for a show in Dublin on March 21st, and another in London on the 23rd. After that, he’ll return stateside for shows in Indianapolis, Washington DC, San Diego, and more. He’ll wrap with a final set in San Jose, California on June 28th. Check out the full list of upcoming dates below.

Gillis has become one of standup’s most popular live acts in recent years. In 2023, he released his most recent standup special, Beautiful Dogs, via Netflix. He’s also appeared on the Peacock series Bupkis, and co-created and stars in the Netflix series Tires.

What Are Shane Gillis’ 2025 Tour Dates?

See the full list of Shane Gillis’ upcoming tour dates below, and grab your tickets here.
